cat_item.display_value: Copy of Merge patch changes to GitHub

catalog_script_client.name: validate branch name

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_daea1e502f420110d4045aab2799b6c2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Merge patch changes to GitHub">39eadadc2f020110d4045aab2799b633</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c6ea1e502f420110d4045aab2799b6af</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>validate branch name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   g_form.clearMessages();

	if(newValue.toLowerCase() == "develop" || newValue.toLowerCase() == "main" || newValue.toLowerCase() == "master") {
		g_form.addErrorMessage(newValue+" cannot be merged with develop/master branch. Please provide a valid branch name.");
		g_form.setValue('feature_branch','');
	}
	else {
		var scopedApp = g_form.getValue('select_your_scope_application');
		var git_repo = g_form.getValue('git_repo');
		var project = g_form.getValue('project');

		var ga = new GlideAjax('GitHubAutomationUtil');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_name','checkValidBranch');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_app',scopedApp);
		ga.addParam('sysparm_git_repo',git_repo);
		ga.addParam('sysparm_project',project);
		ga.addParam('sysparm_branch',newValue);
		ga.getXML(responseCallBack);
	} 
}

function responseCallBack(response) {

	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
	if(answer == null || answer == undefined || answer == 'false')
	{
		g_form.addErrorMessage(g_form.getValue('feature_branch')+" is invalid branch. Please provide a valid branch name.");
		g_form.setValue('feature_branch','');
	}
// 	else {
// 		answer = JSON.parse(answer);
// 		var branchSysID = answer.branchSysID;
// 		var branchName = answer.branchName;
// 	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-01 11:43:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>daea1e502f420110d4045aab2799b6c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validate branch name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GitHub Automation" source="905537112f400110d4045aab2799b6b7">905537112f400110d4045aab2799b6b7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GitHub Automation">905537112f400110d4045aab2799b6b7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_daea1e502f420110d4045aab2799b6c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-01 11:43:57</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
